title: NCSM Notification 2025 - Apply Offline for 02 Trainee Posts
description: The National Council of Science Museums (NCSM) has officially released the notification to fill the vacancies of 02 Trainee Posts. Interested and eligible candidates can use this opportunity to apply for these posts before the deadline. Candidates who have completed their Diploma in Computer Science Engineering can apply for the NCSM Notification 2025 . The interested applicants can apply in offline mode.Â  The application dates have already begun. Here we have mentioned the education details,...
